home.label: Home
home.title: Qendrim's Portfolio

home.headline: AI Enthusiast, Competitor, and Builder
home.subline: Hi! I'm Qendrim, a 2nd Year Computer Science student at the University of Alberta. I'm passionate about AI, competitive programming, and building impactful tools. I’ve worked on projects like a team formation algorithm, sign language detection, and custom comp infrastructure. I’ve also won hackathons and case comps and I’m always looking for new ways to grow and compete.
home.intro: I give my all, learn from losses, and build tools that make teams better.

about.label: About
about.title: About me
about.description: Meet Qendrim — AI-focused, competition-driven, and building toward better systems

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Qendrim is a Computer Science student from Canada with 5 years of programming experience. He’s focused on creating AI-powered tools, winning competitions, and designing systems that scale impact for technical teams.

Index Competitive.achievements: Leading a high-performance student team by building systems for competitive success across tech, business, and design challenges. Created an AI-based team-building algorithm used in competitions like NeuroAlbertaTech.

University Education.description: Studying Computer Science at the University of Alberta with a focus on AI, algorithms, and systems design.

Self-Learning.description: Building skills through online courses, deep dives into ML and systems programming, and competitive projects.

PyTorch.description: Experienced in building and training deep learning models for classification, prediction, and generation tasks.

TensorFlow.description: Proficient in implementing scalable neural networks and deploying models in production environments.

Scikit-learn.description: Used extensively for traditional ML tasks including classification, regression, clustering, and model evaluation.

Pandas & NumPy.description: Skilled in efficient data manipulation, preprocessing pipelines, and numerical computing for ML workflows.

Algorithm Design.description: Strong foundation in building custom algorithms for optimization, team formation, and decision-making systems.

Automation & Scripting.description: Developed systems to automate workflows, simulate outcomes, and streamline data-driven processes.
